recipe_name: Hot prawn and smoked salmon salad
author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Heat the oil in a frying pan over a medium heat. Add the prawns, smoked salmon, chilli flakes and garlic and fry for three minutes. Place the rocket, lemon juice and horseradish into a bowl and mix well. Serve the rocket salad onto a plate, top with the smoked salmon and prawn mixture and top with the fried quails' eggs.
ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil ,  150g/5oz shell on prawns,  100g/3½oz smoked salmon,  pinch dried chilli flakes,  ½ garlic clove, chopped,  2 handfuls rocket,  ½ lemon juice only,  1 tsp grated fresh horseradish,  6 quails' eggs, fried
